amendment.description: Amendment permits funds to be used for constructing greenhouses, gardens (including trees) and other facilities for environmental, scientific, or other educational purposes, or to produce energy savings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 111-106 to permit funds to be used for constructing greenhouses, gardens (including trees), and other facilities for environmental, scientific, or other educational purposes, or to produce energy savings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schwartz amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
